Corporate Law

We advise our clients in the planning of their business in Mexico to establish a solid foundation from a pre-operational level, implement growth strategies and maintain control of its corporate structure and comply with the obligations required for the proper development of its business activities.

Our assistance covers legal issues directly regarding the businesses operations, including banking transactions and operations with related and independent third parties.

We have wide experience in mergers, demergers and transformations of legal entities in Mexico, as well as different types of transactions and implementation of projects, including, among others, joint ventures, project financing, acquisitions, financial transactions, incorporations, etc.

Banking and Finance

Our practice includes planning, negotiation and execution of diverse banking and commercial transactions as well as advising on regulatory issues.

Economic Competition

We advise in processes of notification of concentrations before the COFECE, investigation procedures for monopolistic practices and compliance in matters of economic competition.
